reviewText: I bought this DVD on the review of someone else.  Maybe it was the timing on my part, because the movie did not grab me right away. I plan to watch it again, but I do not plan to get rid of it.

A movie that today's generation can relate to and provides answers for those that are seeking answers about life.
This is a movie that truly teaches about despair and redemption!
I didn't find the movie to be great but I did get it on time and was in great condition.

This is a pretty good film that should be watched with/by teens and young adults.  It's also very inspirational and uplifting.  It can be used as a teaching tool for youth groups.  I would watch it again.
